channel.title: 508 help
channel.description: every time i try to use a 508 client it just comes up with an error error_game_js5connect and it gets stuck on Connecting to update server. I have JDK 6_7 but its just not working Can someone please tell me why???

item.title: 508 help
item.dc:creator: @bryanc Bryanc
item.description:
@bryanc wrote:

The server you are trying to connect to needs to be up, before the client can even start drawing.

Read full topic
